word: G142 - αἴρω - aírō - ah'-ee-ro - Away with

sections.paragraph: (ஆ) அகற்று அல்லது ஓர் இடத்திலிருந்து எடுத்துக் கொண்டு போ - (யோவா 2:16)
2. to take upon oneself and carry what has been raised, to bear
3. to bear away what has been raised, carry off

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primary verb; to lift; by implication to take up or away; figuratively to raise (the voice), keep in suspense (the mind); specifically to sail away (that is, weigh anchor); by Hebraism (compare [H5375]) to expiate sin: - away with, bear (up), carry, lift up, loose, make to doubt, put away, remove, take (away, up).
Cognate: G142, G1869
